import React from 'react'; const RoofConfigurationForm = ({ roofConfig, onConfigChange, projectedArea, visible = true }) => { if (!visible) return null; // Generate roof angle options from 0 to 90 in increments of 10 const roofAngleOptions = Array.from({ length: 10 }, (_, i) => i * 10); return (
{/* Projected Area Display */} {projectedArea > 0 && (

Measured Roof Area

Horizontal Projected Area: {projectedArea.toFixed(2)} m²

Now configure your roof details below to get accurate solar calculations.

)}

Roof Configuration

Please provide additional details about your roof to optimize solar panel calculations.

Direction your roof faces - affects solar energy generation
Roof slope angle in degrees - automatically adjusts roof area calculation
Amount of shade from trees, buildings, or other obstructions
Roof complexity considering chimneys, vents, and other obstacles
); }; export default RoofConfigurationForm;
